features: [UPGRADE MATERIAL] The shoe organizer is made of high-quality metal and durable non-woven fabric that is easy to clean, but also dust-proof, waterproof and oil-proof. The shoe stand would be better for your shoe organizers and storage.

[STABLE STRUCTURE] The toddler shoe rack adopts a more compact design to ensure its stability, thickened metal steel pipe and updated non-woven fabric make the shoe cabinet stronger,and it also ensures the quality,allowing you to say goodbye to cheap and low-quality shoe racks.

[STACKABLE DESIGN] The small shoe organizer adopts stackable tenon joint design. This thin shoe rack reduces the use of floor space and is ideal for a variety of small places. You can order two 4-tier mini shoe racks, you can stack the black shoe self to a 8-tier shoe rack，as an entry shoe rack or closet shoe rack, or front door shoes.

[SPACE SAVE] Dimension:17.7"L x 7.8"W x 22.4"H,skinny shoe rack that can fit in all corners, which keeps your entryways, closets, dorms, patios, mudrooms and garages out of clutter, saving you more space and providing a comfortable and clean environment.

[EASY TO ASSEMBLE] The simple structure and light weight make the shoe storage shelf very convenient for you to assemble and disassemble.Installation requires only a few easy steps and no special tools are needed.You only need a few minutes to get a vertical shoe rack.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Perfect Shoe Storage Organizer Do you also have such troubles, small space, too many shoes, and don't know how to store them? Now HITHIM kids shoe rackk provides you with the perfect solution. 1.DIY yourself shoe racks; 2.The narrow shoe rack is more suitable for baby or toddler;also the best choice for dorm. 3.We specialize in shoe racks, if you have a lot of space and store a lot of shoes, you can choose our other products.

Small Shoe Rack Specification: Dimension: 17.7"L x 7.8"W x 22.4"H, Material:Strengthened Metal Pipes,Non-woven Fabrics Tiers, Plastic Connectors Color:Black Feature: 1.Cost-effective; 2.Lightweight; 3.Easy to install

Detachable & Stackable Shoe Rack Every layer of the rack is independent and you can remove the panels to build it into a 3 or 4-tier shelf to fit different kinds of shoes or large accessories. The stackable design allows you to buy 2 sets and stack them vertically for a larger shoe rack. Multifunctional Storage The mini shoe rack is not only for shoes,but for light and small things,just like CD,book and so on.However it cannot be placed overweight things,please take good care of this skinny shoe rack and let it serve you longer. Simple and Stylish Design The shoe rack small is simple and noble black, which highlights its unique fashion atmosphere. This small shoe organizer can be placed in any corner, which can make reasonable use of the space of your room and make your storage more convenient.

Installation Step Warm Tips 1.The opening of the metal tube is a bit sharp, remember to wear gloves to protect your hands from being scratched when installing 2.The number of thin shoe racks that can actually be stored depends on the exact size of your shoes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little shoe rack
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful and inexpensive rack, fits into smaller spaces and you can’t beat the price!! We just needed 2 of the racks to put near the stairs and used the other 2 in another area. Glad it’s versatile like that. Great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Went together in about three minutes. It's small, but it should be able to fit 8 pairs of thicker shoes (such as sneakers or boots) up to 16 pairs of thinner shoes like slides and sandals (if you stack the sandals on top of each other like I do). The "shelf" is a thin plasticky material but once put together and taught it seems durable; just don't put any shoes with spikes (such as for snow) and don't use too much force to stack like cleats or it could tear. If your careful not to rip that material when putting it together, it's a piece of cake. Looks like it'll also be easy to clean. I recommend! Added: forgot to mention that it came with an extra support rod, it has the option on each shelf for extra support rods under the material, and that it has holes on the top side of all shelf connectors so that you could get another shelf and stack it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Very easy to assemble to around 6 mins each, the quality is too great but it looks great in the closet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It gets the job done for around 8 pairs
reviews.reviewText: It's exactly what I needed and expected for the price. It's worth it to hold dirty shoes in the entrance. If you'd like this for cluttered shoes, it works well and doesn't take up much space!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rugged and easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This item was dilivered faster than anticipated. It was very easy to put together without the need for tools. It is sturdy enough to hold boots and heavy shoes without any issues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Update: seller was great to work with my issue and has taken care of the issueThe product was easy to put together and looked great for about 24 hours. Put shoes on the shelfs and by morning all the material was ripped on each shelf. Would not buy again, waste of money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect size shoe rack for what we needed it for. It is very durable - especially considering the price! I wish I would have bought it sooner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: This could be a touch easier to put together. You have to use a hammer or mallet to really get the pieces together. Otherwise it’s easy, sturdy for what it’s intended for, and fits the size specifications I needed (which wasn’t an easy task!)

reviews.reviewTitle: Surprisingly strong for its lightweight structure.
reviews.reviewText: I made 2 separate racks out of this 4-tier kit. Heavy footwear should be kept at floor level under the first shelf. Good purchase!
